Txt_Shop_Message_Start_01_M.Text: *: Greetings! If you're looking for {WORD}, you're in luck! Now, how can I serve you?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySelect_01_M.Text: *: What would you like to buy?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_Shotage_01_M.Text: *: Sorry, but you don't seem to have enough money with you.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySelectValue_01_M.Text: *: And how many would you like to buy?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySingle_01_M.Text: *: <Cap><IndefSgl_I_NAME>? A fine choice. Thank you for your custom.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyUsefulBattle_01_M.Text: *: You might want to try using <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> as an item in battle!

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectBuyer_01_M.Text: *: Who's going to carry the goods?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmSorting_01_M.Text: *: You can't carry any more items, {ACTOR}. Would you like me to reorganise what you've got?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_FinishSorting_01_M.Text:
*: All done!
I've sorted your things out for you!

Txt_Shop_Message_StopSorting_01_M.Text: *: Unfortunately, you're carrying a lot of important items, {ACTOR}. I can't mess with them!

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectBuyerAgain_01_M.Text: *: Can someone else carry the goods?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyBag_01_M.Text: *: Well, there's always room in your <DefSgl_BAG>!

Txt_Shop_Message_BagFull_01_M.Text: *: Oh my, your bag appears to be rather full...

Txt_Shop_Message_UnableEquip_01_M.Text: *: I'm afraid you can't equip this gear, {ACTOR}. Do you still want to make the purchase?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyConfirmEquip_01_M.Text: *: Would you like to equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> right away?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectAccessorie_01_M.Text: *: Where would you like to equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(these,this)>?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyCurseLift_01_M.Text:
*: Nnngh! No use! Your <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(<Sgl_I_NAME> are stuck fast,<Sgl_I_NAME> is stuck fast)>!<KEY_WAIT>
*: Did your mother never warn you not to play with cursed items? Looks like you'll have to stay as you are for now.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySuccess_Death_01_M.Text: *: I'll just place the goods in {ACTOR}'s coffin.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyOverly_01_M.Text: *: I'll put the rest in your <DefSgl_BAG>, then.

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalBuy_01_M.Text: *: Can I help you with anything else?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_NoItem_Chara_01_M.Text: *: Excuse me? But you aren't carrying anything you can sell, {ACTOR}!

Txt_Shop_Message_NoItem_Bag_01_M.Text: *: There doesn't seem to be anything in your <DefSgl_BAG>!

Txt_Shop_Message_SellCanNot_01_M.Text: *: I'm sorry, but I don't deal in items of that kind.

Txt_Shop_Message_SellConfirmEquip_01_M.Text: *: Erm, you appear to be wearing <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> right now. Are you sure you want to sell <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)>?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmLare_01_M.Text: *: Once you sell something of that ilk, there's no going back. Are you sure you want to do this?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSelectValue_01_M.Text: *: And how many would you like to sell?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSingle_01_M.Text: *: I'll take <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> off your hands for {VALUE} gold coin<IfSing_VALUE(,s)>. Does that sound fair?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellMultiple_01_M.Text:
*: {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(<Sgl_I_NAME>,<Plr_I_NAME>)>?
I'll give you {VALUE2} gold <IfSing_VALUE2(coin,coins)> for <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,<IfSing_VALUE(it,them)>)>.
Is that alright with you?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_GoldFull_01_M.Text: *: It amazes me to say this, but you can't carry any more gold coins! Why don't you buy something from me first?

Txt_Shop_Message_SellCurseLift_01_M.Text:
*: Hm? That item appears to be cursed!
Such a pity...

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalSell_01_M.Text: *: Would you like to sell anything else?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalShop_01_M.Text: *: Is there anything else I can help you with?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmGoldSingle_01_M.Text: *: That comes to {VALUE} gold <IfSing_VALUE(coin,coins)>. Is that alright?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmGoldMultiple_01_.Text: *: That will be {VALUE} gold <IfSing_VALUE(coin,coins)>, please. Does that seem fair to you?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSelect_01_M.Text: *: And what will you be selling today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyOverly_02.Text: *: I'll put the rest in your <DefSgl_BAG>, then.

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalBuy_02.Text: *: Can I help you with anything else?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellCanNot_02.Text: *: Sorry, I'm not interested in things like that.

Txt_Shop_Message_SellConfirmEquip_02.Text: *: But you've got <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> equipped right now, friend! Are you sure?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_Start_01_Smith.Text:
Welcome to my shop...
I wish to be of service...
What do you require...

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySelect_01_Smith.Text: What would you like to buy?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_Shotage_01_Smith.Text: My apologies, but you do not seem to have enough money.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySelectValue_01_Smith.Text: And how many would you like to buy?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySingle_01_Smith.Text: <Cap><IndefSgl_I_NAME>? A fine choice. Thank you for your custom.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyUsefulBattle_01_Smit.Text: You might want to try using <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> as an item in battle.

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectBuyer_01_Smith.Text: Who is going to carry the goods?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmSorting_01_Smith.Text: You cannot carry any more items, {ACTOR}. Would you like me to reorganise what you have?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_FinishSorting_01_Smith.Text:
I am finished.
Your things have been sorted.

Txt_Shop_Message_StopSorting_01_Smith.Text: Unfortunately, you are carrying a lot of important items, {ACTOR}. It would be rude of me to touch them.

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectBuyerAgain_01_Smi.Text: Can someone else carry the goods?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyBag_01_Smith.Text: Well, there is always room in your <DefSgl_BAG>.

Txt_Shop_Message_BagFull_01_Smith.Text: Your bag seems to be full...

Txt_Shop_Message_UnableEquip_01_Smith.Text: I am afraid you cannot equip this gear, {ACTOR}. Do you still want to make the purchase?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyConfirmEquip_01_Smit.Text: Would you like to equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> right away?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectAccessorie_01_Smi.Text: Where would you like to equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(these,this)>?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyCurseLift_01_Smith.Text:
Nnngh! It is no use! Your <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(<Sgl_I_NAME> are stuck fast,<Sgl_I_NAME> is stuck fast)>.<KEY_WAIT>
Did your mother never warn you not to play with cursed items? I think you will have to stay as you are for now.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySuccess_Death_01_Smi.Text: I will just place the goods in {ACTOR}'s coffin.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyOverly_01_Smith.Text: I will put the rest in your <DefSgl_BAG>, then.

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalBuy_01_Smith.Text: Can I help you with anything else?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_NoItem_Chara_01_Smith.Text: Excuse me? But you are not carrying anything you can sell, {ACTOR}.

Txt_Shop_Message_NoItem_Bag_01_Smith.Text: There does not seem to be anything in your <DefSgl_BAG>.

Txt_Shop_Message_SellCanNot_01_Smith.Text: I am sorry, but I do not deal in items of that kind.

Txt_Shop_Message_SellConfirmEquip_01_Smi.Text: You appear to be wearing <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> right now. Are you sure you want to sell <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)>?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmLare_01_Smith.Text: Once you sell something of that ilk, there is no going back. Are you sure you want to do this?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSelectValue_01_Smit.Text: And how many would you like to sell?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSingle_01_Smith.Text: I will buy <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> for {VALUE} gold coin<IfSing_VALUE(,s)>. Does that sound fair?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellMultiple_01_Smith.Text:
{VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(<Sgl_I_NAME>,<Plr_I_NAME>)>?
I will give you {VALUE2} gold <IfSing_VALUE2(coin,coins)> for <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,<IfSing_VALUE(it,them)>)>.
Is that alright with you?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_GoldFull_01_Smith.Text: It amazes me to say this, but you cannot carry any more gold coins. Would you like to buy something from me first?

Txt_Shop_Message_SellCurseLift_01_Smith.Text:
Hm? That item appears to be cursed!
Such a pity...

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalSell_01_Smith.Text: Would you like to sell anything else?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalShop_01_Smith.Text: Is there anything else I can help you with?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectBuyerAgain_01_Bur.Text: Can someone else carry the goods?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyBag_01_Burg_F.Text: Well, there's always room in your <DefSgl_BAG>!

Txt_Shop_Message_BagFull_01_Burg_F.Text: Your bag seems to be a bit full...

Txt_Shop_Message_UnableEquip_01_Burg_F.Text: I'm afraid you can't equip this gear, {ACTOR}. Do you still want to make the purchase?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyConfirmEquip_01_Burg.Text: Would you like to equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> right away?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SelectAccessorie_01_Bur.Text: Where would you like to equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(these,this)>?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyCurseLift_01_Burg_F.Text:
Nnngh! No use! Your <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(<Sgl_I_NAME> are stuck fast,<Sgl_I_NAME> is stuck fast)>!<KEY_WAIT>
Did your mother never warn you not to play with cursed items? Looks like you'll have to stay as you are for now.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuySuccess_Death_01_Bur.Text: I'll just place the goods in {ACTOR}'s coffin.

Txt_Shop_Message_BuyOverly_01_Burg_F.Text: I'll put the rest in your <DefSgl_BAG>, then.

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalBuy_01_Burg_F.Text: Can I help you with anything else?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_NoItem_Chara_01_Burg_F.Text: Excuse me? But you aren't carrying anything you can sell, {ACTOR}!

Txt_Shop_Message_NoItem_Bag_01_Burg_F.Text: There doesn't seem to be anything in your <DefSgl_BAG>!

Txt_Shop_Message_SellCanNot_01_Burg_F.Text: I'm sorry, but I don't deal in items of that kind.

Txt_Shop_Message_SellConfirmEquip_01_Bur.Text: Erm, you appear to be wearing <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> right now. Are you sure you want to sell <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)>?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmLare_01_Burg_F.Text: Once you sell something of that ilk, there's no going back. Are you sure you want to do this?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSelectValue_01_Burg.Text: And how many would you like to sell?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSingle_01_Burg_F.Text: I'll take <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> off your hands for {VALUE} gold coin<IfSing_VALUE(,s)>. Does that sound fair?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellMultiple_01_Burg_F.Text:
{VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(<Sgl_I_NAME>,<Plr_I_NAME>)>?
I'll give you {VALUE2} gold <IfSing_VALUE2(coin,coins)> for <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,<IfSing_VALUE(it,them)>)>.
Is that alright with you?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_GoldFull_01_Burg_F.Text: It amazes me to say this, but you can't carry any more gold coins! Why don't you buy something from me first?

Txt_Shop_Message_SellCurseLift_01_Burg_F.Text:
Hm? That item appears to be cursed!
Such a pity...

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalSell_01_Burg_.Text: Would you like to sell anything else?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_AdditionalShop_01_Burg_.Text: Is there anything else I can help you with?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmGoldSingle_01_Bu.Text: That comes to {VALUE} gold <IfSing_VALUE(coin,coins)>. Is that alright?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_ConfirmGoldMultiple_01_.Text: That will be {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(coin,coins)>, please. Does that seem fair to you?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_Message_SellSelect_01_Burg_F.Text: What would you like to sell?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_Top.Text: *: Greetings, friend! I have been awaiting just such a customer as you! Will you browse my wares?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_SelectNo.Text: *: Never mind! Do not stand on ceremony, friend! Scrutinise, peruse, poke and prod all you wish!<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_CancelBuy.Text: *: But what is this? Nothing that I sell has taken your fancy? How can this be? Friend, you must look again!

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_ConfirmBuy_01.Text: *: My, you certainly have an eye for a bargain, friend! Shall we shake on the paltry sum of {VALUE} gold coins?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_ConfirmBuy_02.Text:
*: Ach, you are a most wily and hard-nosed negotiator! I bow before your unrivalled bargaining prowess!<KEY_WAIT>
*: Very well. Shall we say...{VALUE} gold coins? Surely this price will please even such an expert as yourself?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_ConfirmBuy_03.Text:
*: May the lords in the heavens have mercy! Do you mean to put me out of business, friend!?<KEY_WAIT>
*: I can go no lower than {VALUE}. To do so would be to take bread from the mouths of my dear children! Deal?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_ConfirmBuy_04.Text:
*: Please, friend<--->to go any lower would be to place my livelihood in jeopardy!<KEY_WAIT>
*: But since you are a friend, just this once I can offer you a price of {VALUE} gold coins. This is perfect, no?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_CancelBuy_02.Text: *: You will not take this most reasonable offer? That is a shame. Oh well. Perhaps next time.

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_Shotage.Text: *: But friend! You do not possess enough gold coins to make this purchase! Come again when you are able to pay.

Txt_Shop_SCAM_Message_BuySuccess.Text:
*: Truly? You will pay this price?
Friend, you are a friend indeed!
You are welcome here any time!
